ISSUE.TITLE: Project Job Templates tab shouldn't allow creation of WFJTs
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ##### ISSUE TYPE - Bug Report ##### SUMMARY Not necessarily a bug, but just "too much functionality". When adding a Job Template within the context of the Project page, it automatically associates the project with the JT. This makes sense. However, the add button also allows you to create workflows, which doesn't make a lot of sense because they aren't associated with a single project: ![Screenshot from 2020-03-25 09-43-34](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/19942822/77543308-e464cc80-6e7d-11ea-9784-fd968939b3b5.png) The button should only allow you to add a JT. Steps: 1. Create a project 2. Visit that project's tab called "Job Templates" 3. Attempt to add a template

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Add management command to precreate partitioned tables (#14076) (#6403)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Retry HashiCorp Vault requests on HTTP 412 (#6413) HC Vault clusters use eventual consistency and might return an HTTP 412 if the secret ID hasn't replicated yet to the replicas / standby nodes. If this happens the request should be retried. related #13413 Signed-off-by: Kristof Wevers <kristof.wevers@infura.eu> Co-authored-by: Kristof Wevers <kristof.wevers@infura.eu> Co-authored-by: Jessica Steurer <70719005+jay-steurer@users.noreply.github.com>
